definition: to pick/to select/to take/to capture (data)/to acquire/to pick up (a signal)

sentences.english: Retrieves the security token that matches the specified key identifier clause.
sentences.chinese: 撷取与指定之金钥识别码子句相符的安全性权杖。

sentences.english: Explains how to retrieve custom attribute information in the reflection-only context.
sentences.chinese: 说明如何撷取仅限反映的内容中的自订属性资讯。

sentences.english: Retrieves the bounding rectangle for a specific item within the list view control.
sentences.chinese: 撷取清单检视控制项内特定项目的周框。

sentences.english: Mommy exits to fetch Mrs. Barker some water.
sentences.chinese: 妈咪出口夫人巴克撷取一些水。

sentences.english: This has been done in text-based retrieval systems to a certain degree.
sentences.chinese: 确定程度且以文字为基础的撷取系统已经完成。

sentences.english: So that , capturing that group of customers is the tipping point.
sentences.chinese: 因此，撷取的客户群是转折点。

sentences.english: Pre-fetching cached information is the recommended workaround.
sentences.chinese: 建议的解决方法是预先撷取快取的资讯。

sentences.english: Nonautomatic accessors require you to explicitly retrieve the data.
sentences.chinese: 非自动存取子会要求您明确地撷取资料。

sentences.english: The destination queue is purged or deleted before the message is retrieved.
sentences.chinese: 撷取讯息前，会清除或删除目的伫列。

sentences.english: Get the information you need and give the issue your time and attention.
sentences.chinese: 从中撷取你所需要的信息，倾注时间和注意力。

definition: to trace over/to take a copy (of a calligraphy, a painting etc)/(fig.) to describe/to portray
for the benefit of the reader
to comb through (historical documents etc)/to unravel
understanding and enjoying (a work of art)
mix together/put together (usu. things that do not blend well together)
to look at sth through a bamboo tube/to have a restricted view
to touch up (a piece of writing)/to add details (to a painting)
